examples.korean: Everyone admires her strength of character and determination. 발음듣기 모든 사람이 그녀의 강인한 기개와 결단력을 흠모한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everyone admires her strength of character and determination. 발음

examples.korean: She did it on her own initiative. 발음듣기 그녀는 본인 결단에 따라 그것을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She did it on her own initiative. 발음

examples.korean: She looked purposeful and determined. 발음듣기 그녀는 결단력 있고 단호해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She looked purposeful and determined. 발음

examples.korean: This is not a job for someone who lacks decision. 발음듣기 이 일은 결단력이 부족한 사람이 할 수 있는 일이 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is not a job for someone who lacks decision. 발음

examples.korean: She has the determination that her brother lacks. 발음듣기 그녀는 오빠[남동생]에게는 없는 결단력이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has the determination that her brother lacks. 발음
